join.text: Sign up to our mailing list. We'll let you know once our platform goes live.
join.title: Join Faktenforum

learn.text: Interested in fact-checking? Check out our video tutorials and learning materials.
learn.title: Learn about fact-checking

submit.text: You come across a suspicious information? Submit it here or via the CORRECTIV.Faktencheck chatbot.
submit.title: Submit a claim

intro.text: CORRECTIV.Faktenforum shields users and their environment against disinformation through on-hands training and counters disinformation with facts. In teams or by themselves, with the support of smart tools or professional journalists, users fact-check suspicious claims. We work according to professional standards and along the rating scale of CORRECTIV.Faktencheck. Check out our articles.
intro.title: What we do

link.label: Insert a Link
link.title: Enter a link to a file to upload

submitPage.request: Can you provide some additional information?

source.text: You can submit a source supporting or refuting the claim. Add the original text of your source or a link to the source. Describe why the source is important to your fact-check.
source.title: Submit a source

submitPage.text: You can submit a claim in three different ways: upload a file, provide a direct link to a file or describe a misinformation you witnessed. Leave your email address so we can get back to you!
submitPage.title: Submit a claim
